palette.name: Trigger
palette.backend: class extends $.Node { output = new $.Output("Output"); _interval; constructor(id, channel) { super(id, channel); } configure(config) { console.log('config trigger node'); this._interval = setInterval(() => { this.output.Send("Hello"); }, 10000); } destructor() { clearInterval(this._interval); } }

palette.name: Consumer
palette.backend: class extends $.Node { input = new $.Input("Input"); constructor(id, channel) { super(id, channel); this.input.on("updated", (msg) => { this.error(msg); }); } configure(config) { console.log('config debug node'); } }
